I was able to determine the number of marks with considerable accuracy. I learned skills such as co-operation, team work and integrity. ACADEMIC PROJECTS Crisis Management System An one-stop to manage all your crisis like a pro. It is an initiative towards providing relief to needy Jul 2020 - Nov 2020 people in times of crisis and chaos. This application project is made for addressing the most common problems of the people who need them in the times of utmost distress, grief and pain. It resolves various issues in a technical and data-driven manner and tries to establish the feeling of contentment. Front-End: HTML5, CSS, Javascript; Back-End: PHP, phpMyAdmin; Database: MySQL Features and Attributes: 1. Chat Counselling, 2. Video Conference Counselling, 3. Route Tracker Informer, 4. Daily News and Updates, 5. Fitness and Well-Being Tracker, 6. COVID-19 Status Checker, 7. Video Streaming, 8. Donation Drive. Smart City - Automating Solutions for your City Mar 2021 - Jun 2021 The working prototype will essentially have 4 components, which are smart street lamp, garbage level indicator, smart delivery truck & moisture sensing apparatus for detecting humidity and water. All these will be controlled by compiled programs and the hardware & software interaction. Softwares used: 1. Arduino IDE 1.8.13 , 2. Draw.io, 3. Tinkercad, 4. NodeMCU_Car.apk , 5. Circuito.io Hardwares used: 1. Arduino UNO, 2. IR Sensor, 3. Ultrasound Sensor , 4. NodeMCU (WiFi Module) , 5. Soil moisture sensor, 6. L298N motor controller, 7. 200 RPM single shaft BO motor , 8. Tower pro SG90, servo-9 gms mini/ macro servo motor , 9. Breadboard, 10. LEDs, 11. 220 ohm resistors, 12. Breadboard- mini, 13. Jumper wires. Game Recommendation System A recommendation system for video games, which suggests gamers the best fit game for them based Jul 2021 - Apr 2022 upon their choice and gaming-habit. Objectives: 1. Exploration and Analysis of steam-200k.csv and steam-games.csv dataset. 2. Data Cleaning of steam-games.csv dataset. 3. Create ratings using Expectation Maximization Algorithm. 4. Generate recommendations using collaborative filtering algorithms: SVD Algorithm & SVD with Gradient Descent. Fake News Detection using Machine Learning Algorithms Dec 2021 - Apr 2022

PROJECTS . Phishing Url Detection with Algorithm Analysis (ML Classification, Data Preparation): Takes urls as input and tags them as good or bad using best algorithm(out of 3 algorithms-Logistic Regression( Accuracy: 96,36%), Multinomial NB(Accuracy: 95.78%), and Random Forest(Accuracy: 70%)). Batch processing of Image and text steganography using multithreading provided same result with lesser excecution period(On avg, 20% faster in case of images and 10% in case of texts) . UML2JAVA (Core Java, Swing, Windows Builder, OOPs): It helps in generating Java code templates in less time and effort along with providing custom methods like get/set from user inputs. It gives constructor,class and method support. Followed pipe-filter architecture because concurrent data attribute formatting takes place. School and Hostel Database Management System (Java, Swing API, Netbeans 12, MySQL ): A database management system for managing students and borders at an institute. The user interface was created using Swing APl integration in Netbeans 12 and MySQL was used for the backend . Cloud server analysing the traffic through our Tor Bridge using NYX tool and visualize network congestion by plotting IP addresses over world map.
